title: Modern converter processes
creator_credit: Technical and Scientific Films, Film Producers Guild and Terrick Fitzhugh
brief_description: Traces the development of converters from the Bessemer converter to the modern oxygen converter processes used in the steel industry today. Describes the LD, LD/AC, Kaldo and Rotor processes. Chemical reactions are dealt with in animated sequences.
creator_credit_for_label: Technical and Scientific Films, Film Producers Guild and Terrick Fitzhugh
